report.description: Report on custom event to WARP

params.name: sEventComponent
params.description: The event component. (e.g. W5G, TEMPLATE, EDITOR)

params.name: sEventType
params.description: The type of the event. (e.g. Search)

params.name: sEventValue
params.description: The value of the event. (e.g. Project Name)

params.name: oIDEData
params.description: The object contains the specific information (e.g. user, account etc.)
